activities: Offerpop provides web and mobile software applications to businesses that use social networks like Facebook and Twitter to interact with consumers. Businesses use our software to develop custom apps.  Businesses with customers in the EU and/or Switzerland can promote their apps to their customers in those regions.  Consumers who use an app may choose to share email or other personal information with the business.  All such information is collected and stored securely by Offerpop for access by the business, and for anonymous, aggregate statistical analysis.  Offerpop does not use information for any other purpose. Information is retained unless business or consumer requests deletion.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
